name: SM Team
author: Mahabubur Rahman

sections.description:
SM Team is a wordpress plugin to list and display team members as grid. You can add team members profile, social links, image, location etc.

Shortcode

[sm-member theme="theme_name"]

Features

  • Fully Responsive.
  • Clean Design.
  • Use via shortcode.
  • Bootstrap based design.
  • Social profile link integrated.
  • Add Team Member From SM Team tab.
  • All browser compatible.
  • Easy to setup.
  • Add Unlimited members.

Fields

  • Member Name
  • Member Details
  • Designation
  • Member Image
  • Email
  • Personal Site
  • Mobile
  • Telephone
  • Location
  • Linkedin
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Google+
  • Youtube
  • Vimeo
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire sm-team folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

After activate plugin you will see “SM Team” menu at side nav menu bar on WordPress dashboard.

First create some team member from “SM Team”.

After creating some member you need to use shortcode on the page where you want to display Member List.

Usage

  1. Go to SM Team->Add New.
  2. Add some member.
  3. Use shortcede [sm-member] anywhere your page to display Team as grid.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Change the plugin from procedure oriented to object oriented.
  • Fix some programming issue.

1.4.0

  • Add one new theme for member showcase.
  • Change Shortcode as [sm-member theme="theme_name"] ie. 1,2 or 3
  • Fix some design issue.

1.3.0

  • Add one new theme for member showcase.
  • The shortcode is sm-member-theme-2

1.2.0

  • Add option page to view shortcode list.
  • Fix some design issue.

1.1.0

  • Add New Shortcode for team member list.
  • The shortcode is sm-member theme-1

1.0.0

  • Create new post type.
  • Create a basic simple shortcode.
  • The shortcode is sm-member
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire sm-team folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

After activate plugin you will see “SM Team” menu at side nav menu bar on WordPress dashboard.

First create some team member from “SM Team”.

After creating some member you need to use shortcode on the page where you want to display Member List.

Usage

  1. Go to SM Team->Add New.
  2. Add some member.
  3. Use shortcede [sm-member] anywhere your page to display Team as grid.
